=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Review Date: 2020/12/06

Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
Review Text: I got this oil for my wife to try, and she really likes it. She reports that it goes on smoothly and feels light on her skin (unlike some other oils she has used). The scent is mild/neutral. It also leaves her skin feeling nicely moisturized and smooth, which is especially welcomed in the colder weather when her skin tends to dry out. Highly recommended.
Review Title: Excellent Oil
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
COSMETEA Korean Essence Face Masks - T1 Oolong Tea Hydrating Ampoule Full Facial Masks 10 Pack Treatments, Care Your Skin Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Purifying, Deep Moisturizing with Hyaluronic Acid
Cosmetea
{'Brand': 'Cosmetea', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.8 x 1.8 inches; 13.62 Ounces'}
My wife experiences dry, itchy skin, especially during the colder months. She tried these masks over a period of a couple of months last winter and spring to see if they could make a difference, and I'm happy to report that she gives them a positive rating for several reasons. They have mild ingredients derived from oolong tea and hyaluronic acid (which she has used in other products). The masks are very easy to apply: with some gentle, even pressure she was able to get them evenly onto her skin. After leaving the mask on for about 15 minutes, she felt a definite hydrating result. My wife recommends these!
Excellent, Hydrating Masks!
Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Argan Magic

I got this oil for my wife to try, and she really likes it. She reports that it goes on smoothly and feels light on her skin (unlike some other oils she has used). The scent is mild/neutral. It also leaves her skin feeling nicely moisturized and smooth, which is especially welcomed in the colder weather when her skin tends to dry out. Highly recommended.

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Skincare Focus:** The user maintains a strong preference for hydration-focused skincare products that combat dryness, evidenced by their continued interest in moisturizers and oils.

- **Product Experience:** The positive experience with gentle, natural ingredients such as Argan oil and Vitamin E indicates a commitment to effective yet mild formulations for skin care, which are particularly beneficial during colder months.

- **Impact of Seasons:** There is an active concern for skin hydration during winter, underlining the user’s need for products that provide deep moisture and relief from dryness.

- **Ease of Use:** The user values convenience in their skincare routine, favoring products that are easy to apply and incorporate into daily practice.

- **Animal Welfare:** A commitment to cruelty-free and ethically sourced products is evident, as the user seeks brands that align with this ethical consideration.

- **Shared Use:** The influence of the user's wife on product selections highlights a family-oriented approach to skincare, where preferences and shared experiences shape choices.

Overall, the user continues to prioritize efficient, effective, and ethically produced skincare solutions that ensure hydration and comfort for skin, particularly during seasonal transitions, while valuing a light, pleasant application experience.
